metadata.title: CVE-2017-9299 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 3.3.9 has XSS inindex.pl?Action=AgentStats requests, as demonstrated by OrderBy=[XSS] andDirection=[XSS] attacks. NOTE: this CVE may have limited relevance becauseit represents a 2017 discovery of an issue in software from 2014. The3.3.20 release, for example, is not affected.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
